org.jfree.chart.plot
Class CategoryPlotWrapper

java.lang.Object
  org.jfree.chart.plot.CategoryPlotWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
Block, org.jfree.ui.Drawable
public class CategoryPlotWrapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements Block

This wrapper presents an CategoryPlot as a Block that only draws the plot and not the axes.

Constructor Summary
CategoryPlotWrapper(CategoryPlot plot)
          Creates a new wrapper for the given plot.

arrange

public org.jfree.ui.Size2D arrange(java.awt.Graphics2D g2,
                                   ArrangeParams params)
Arranges the contents of the block, with no constraints, and returns the block size. In general, the size returned by this method is the preferred size for the block.

Specified by:
arrange in interface Block
Parameters:
g2 - the graphics device.
params - optional parameters.
Returns:
The size of the block following the arrangement.
